TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegistrationServices extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices

summary.span: 提供一组用于注册和注销托管程序集以供从 COM 使用的服务。

span.span: Provides a set of services for registering and unregistering managed assemblies for use from COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在一个程序集的对象正在使用的 COM 客户端时，需要注册。Registration is needed when the objects within an assembly are being used by COM clients. [Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)并[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]公开的方法类来添加或删除支持 COM 的注册表项的托管程序集。The [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) and [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] use methods exposed by the class to add or remove COM-enabling registry entries for managed assemblies. 可以使用以下方法来帮助您准备注册文件：You can use the following methods to assist you in preparing a registration file: - - - - 尽管这些方法中收集的信息帮助注册文件中使用，但它们不实际生成注册文件。Although these methods help in gathering information to be used in a registration file, they do not actually produce a registration file. 相反，可以使用[Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)工具用于`/regfile`选项来执行此任务。Instead, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) tool with the `/regfile` option to perform this task. 方法不能导出并注册类型库。 methods cannot export and register a type library. 若要导出并注册类型库，可以使用[Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)工具并[Tlbexp.exe （类型库导出程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)工具。To export and register a type library, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) tool and the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) tool.

span.span: Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)

span.span: if contains types that were successfully registered; otherwise if the assembly contains no eligible types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RegisterAssembly` 中指定的程序集添加相应的注册表项的类型。`RegisterAssembly` adds the appropriate registry entries for the types in the specified assembly. 此方法还会调用程序集中找到的任何注册函数。This method also calls any registration functions found in the assembly. 使用获取程序集。Use to get an assembly.

summary.span: 向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，使用平台调用来调用非托管`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支持用于注册和注销 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

param.name: type
param.span: 要注册以供从 COM 使用的 。

span.span: The to be registered for use from COM.
The used to register the specified type.

summary.span: 使用指定的 GUID 向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法相当于调用`CoRegisterClassObject`中 com。This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不是原子的并可能导致不可预知的结果时在多线程的上下文中使用。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在版本 2.0 及更高版本中，使用方法来取消注册 COM 中的类型In version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 请注意，使用平台调用来调用非托管`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支持用于注册和注销 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter cannot be created.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

span.span: One of the values that indicates the context in which the executable code will be run.

span.span: One of the values that specifies how connections are made to the class object.

summary.span: 使用指定的执行上下文和连接类型向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified execution context and connection type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法相当于调用`CoRegisterClassObject`中 com。This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不是原子的并可能导致不可预知的结果时在多线程的上下文中使用。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 及更高版本中，使用方法来取消注册 COM 中的类型In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 请注意，使用平台调用来调用非托管`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支持用于注册和注销 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

The parameter cannot be created.

span.span: if contains types that were successfully unregistered; otherwise if the assembly contains no eligible types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnregisterAssembly` 删除类型的注册表项中指定的程序集之前由添加。`UnregisterAssembly` removes the registry entries for the types in the specified assembly previously added by . 此方法还会调用程序集中找到的任何注销函数。This method also calls any unregistration functions found in the assembly.
